moving on to the next phase the first part is the terminology Ben uses of a

upgrade and improve our network capability because we wanted a high

Connect and we routed all of our agencies Internet traffic out through our Amazon environment which gave us
full resilience and full scale with internet outages internet services to give me and then we chose to build and

Directory database email and message routing proxy services and reverse proxy

Cape core services it allowed us in some cases to retire some technical debt and
also to uplift and improve and so when we positioned our Active Directory
for example into the environment we split Active Directory controllers across the three availability zones
